General.Name: Prime Oil Chemical Service Corp
General.Description: Prime Oil Chemical Service Corporation provides petrochemical shore tank storage services in Taiwan. The company is also involved in the building and operation of photovoltaic power generation systems with a total installed capacity of 20.5MW. It serves petrochemical manufacturers and traders. The company was founded in 1978 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 131, Minsheng East Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 105
